document.full_text: french crash investigators plan to give an update on the sequence of events in the 2009 rio-paris jet disaster friday may 27, the bea air accident bureau said.
document.title: investigators to give details on 2009 rio-paris air france crash
lines_and_colors: french crash investigators plan to give an update on the sequence of events in the 2009 rio-paris jet disaster friday may 27, the bea air accident bureau said.
